patterns: What is Estate Bridge?
Tell me about Estate Bridge
How does Estate Bridge work?
What is this platform for?
What features does Estate Bridge have?
responses: Estate Bridge is a real estate platform designed to simplify buying, selling, and renting properties by connecting property owners, buyers, and agents.
Estate Bridge is an agent-facilitated P2P system that allows users to list, browse, and rent properties while interacting with verified real estate agents.
Estate Bridge provides AI-powered tools for property search, virtual tours, shared renting, agent reviews, and smart property valuation.

patterns: How can I list my property?
How do I add a property?
I want to list a property
responses: To list a property, go to the 'List Property' section in your dashboard and fill in the required details.
You can list your property by providing details like address, price, and images in the 'List Property' section.

patterns: How can I sell my property?
I want to sell my house
Where can I sell my property?
responses: To sell your property, list it under 'Property Listings' with details such as price, location, and description.
You can sell your house by listing it under the 'Sell Property' section and connecting with buyers.

patterns: Show me available properties
How can I find a property?
I want to browse properties
responses: You can browse properties by visiting the 'Browse Properties' section and applying filters like price and location.
Use the 'Search Properties' option to find properties that match your preferences.

patterns: How can I rent a property?
I need a house for rent
Find me rental properties
responses: You can browse available rentals in the 'Rent Property' section and contact owners directly.
To find rental properties, use filters like location, budget, and number of rooms in the 'Rent Property' section.

patterns: How do I contact an agent?
I need help from an agent
Find me a real estate agent
responses: To contact an agent, go to the property details page and click 'Contact Agent'.
You can connect with agents by visiting the 'Find Agent' section in your dashboard.

patterns: How do I rate an agent?
Can I leave a review for an agent?
I want to give feedback on my agent
responses: To rate an agent, go to 'My Transactions', select the agent, and leave a rating.
You can review an agent by navigating to their profile and submitting your rating.

patterns: Are shared rentals available?
Can I find roommates?
I want to rent a shared property
responses: You can find shared rentals in the 'Shared Renting' section.
To find a shared property, check the 'Shared Rentals' listings for available rooms.

patterns: Can I take a virtual tour?
What is 360 tour?
I want to see a 360-degree view of the house
responses: You can take a 360-degree view of properties by clicking '360° View' on the property details page.
For an immersive experience, select the '360° View' option on the property listing.

patterns: How much is my property worth?
Can I check property value?
Estimate my property's price
responses: Use the 'Property Valuation' tool in your dashboard to get an estimate of your property's worth.
Our AI valuation tool provides real-time price estimates based on market trends.

patterns: Can I compare properties?
How do I compare houses?
Show me property comparisons
responses: Use the 'Compare Properties' feature to compare prices, locations, and amenities.
To compare properties, add them to your comparison list and check the side-by-side analysis.

patterns: I need a 3-bedroom apartment in Lahore
Find me a house in DHA for 50K rent
responses: Use the AI-powered text-based search to enter your requirements, and we’ll match properties for you.
Simply describe your property needs, and our system will apply smart filters to find relevant listings.

patterns: Can I see analytics for an area?
Show me crime rates for a neighborhood
responses: Use 'Area Analytics' to check crime rates, amenities, and market trends in any location.
Our system provides insights on safety, schools, hospitals, and property demand for any area.
I'm sorry, I don't know about that.
I am not sure about that. Can you ask something else?
I don't have information on that topic right now.
